meanings.definition: A piece of furniture with a central section that projects forward.
meanings.sent1: The breakfront in the living room displayed beautiful china.
meanings.sent2: The antique breakfront added elegance to the dining room.
meanings.sent3: The breakfront in the kitchen seemed to be showing off its dishes.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a breakfront, projecting warmth and welcome.
meanings.sent5: The breakfront stood proudly, showcasing its contents for all to see.

meanings.definition: To have a front that projects forward.
meanings.sent1: The building breakfronts onto the main street.
meanings.sent2: His confidence breakfronted as he spoke in front of the crowd.
meanings.sent3: The cat breakfronted towards the bowl of food eagerly.
meanings.sent4: Her words breakfronted into the silence, capturing everyone's attention.
meanings.sent5: The sun breakfronted over the horizon, signaling the start of a new day.
